subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: A blown call by the N.F.L.’s highest-profile official has opened the floodgates to an unusual level of scrutiny and from coaches and players in the first half of the season.
snippet: A blown call by the N.F.L.’s highest-profile official has opened the floodgates to an unusual level of scrutiny and from coaches and players in the first half of the season.
